short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically apply coupon codes when you shop and plant trees on your behalf.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How it works
Shop. 
Over 30,000+ merchants are with us. You are welcome to shop at any of these stores through Tenere to have coupon codes automatically applied at checkout. 
Save Money. 
Tenere finds and applies the best discount for your order that takes just a few seconds. All you need to do is shop like normal. 
Plant Trees. 
This is what makes us different from others. On your behalf, we plant trees around the world using part of our commission on your completed orders.

Save time, Save money and Save the Planet, install Tenere today for free!


Transparency
The only thing that can keep us moving forward is your trust. You are free to access our monthly financial reports and tree-planting receipts for transparency.
Install Tenere to support this green movement.



We Are Not Perfect
Not only does Tenere save you money on your purchase with auto-applied coupons, it also helps combat climate change by supporting tree-planting projects. While other existing extensions do not offer the latter, Tenere is proud to have you on board.
Yet, big ambition might come with flaws. We are working hard to improve.


Need help? Got suggestions? Contact us at  help@tenereteam.com
--------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer:
This extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout or you can set up a filter in Adblock Plus or similar ad blocker tools like AdBlock, uBlock or Adblock Pro.
